name: The Skeleton Menace
description:
Each night swarms of skeletons attack your castle!

Defend it with your magical bow.

Slay The Skeleton Menace!

Controls:

WASD to Move

Left Click to Shoot

Mouse Wheel To Zoom in and out

TAB to open Bow Upgrades Menu

Escape for Exit Menu

Psst... Look in the lower right hand corner. There's a secret.

My submission for the first b3agz game jam!

Each night the swarm gets larger and larger, it's endless, until your computer can't handle the amount of enemies and crashes. lol

Ya so this is really unfinished and unpolished, I had about 10 hours to work on it.

I tried to build it for web, but it kept crashing so windows download only. Sorry!

I hope you enjoy. :)

Everything was either free from the Unity Store or I bought it on the Unity Store.

Music is royalty free by FesliyanStudios. https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
